sources.title: The Kid Rides Again
sources.description: Billy (Buster Crabbe) breaks jail in Texas and travels to Sundown at the request of his friend Fuzzy (Al St. John). There he runs into Mort Slade (I. Stanford Jolley) who is after a mortgage held by banker Ainsley (Edward Peil Sr.). Slade's men rob the bank and then incite a run on the bank knowing Ainsley does not have enough money.

metadata.Plot: Billy breaks jail in Texas and travels to Sundown at the request of his friend Fuzzy. There he runs into Mort Slade who is after a mortgage held by banker Ainsley. Slade's men rob the bank and then incite a run on the bank knowing Ainsley does not have enough money.
metadata.Actors: Buster Crabbe, Al St. John, Iris Meredith
